dct_title_s: Bartholomew's "Half inch to mile" map of England & Wales
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by contours, gradient tints, and spot heights. "Copyright, John Bartholomew, F.R.G.S." "Reduced by permission from the new revised ordnance survey, with special local revision and correction to date of publication"--Bottom margin. "Roads revised by the Cyclists' Touring Club"--Bottom margin. "Sheet 32"--Top margin. Indicates first class, secondary and passable roads, footpaths & bridlepaths, hights in feet above sea level, railways and stations, canals, and county boundaries. Originally issued folded in covers 19 x 10 cm.
